titleStmt.title: A catalogue of English, Greek and Latin books, both ancient and modern especially of the writings of the most eminent divines of our own nation, together with variety of other books ... which will be sold by auction ... at Frank's Coffee-house ... on Wednesday the 13th of this instant October 1697 ... / by Thomas Axe.
